message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exclusive product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll be willing to pay a premium for it. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.
Alice, $12,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $10,500.  Let me know if that works for you.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11,500.
